ygData.subject: RE: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: anything, anything but plate helm on a wood elf! fine silk turbin, crown of the froglok kings, hell even a woven cap but no plate! my bio: FEAR THE HELM!!! i
ygData.messageBody:
anything, anything but plate helm on a wood elf!
fine silk turbin, crown of the froglok kings, hell even a woven cap but no
plate!

my bio: FEAR THE HELM!!!
i keep my imbrued helm on me to scare people, or for laughs.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L39 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Speaking of daft, although I've got the Lambent helm I've stopped
> wearing it because of how silly I look! It's a bit of a downer to a
> girl when she joins a group only to have a paladin wander up to her
> and tell her how bad her helmet looks on her!! Maybe they only come
> in size huge for a wood elf, but it's awful!
